title: Dr. Sinbad: The Unschooled Village "Doctor"
description: Dr. Sinbad is a fictional comic about an untrained doctor treating patients in a small village in Africa. Once a janitor in a city clinic, she had observed keenly as health workers treated patients and sometimes helped them discharge minor medical tasks.Later, she would open her own clinic in the village.Dr. Sinbad is greedy, blunt, covetous and money-grabbing but Nevertheless, the village medical champion.Her eccentrics will surely tickle your funny bone.Enjoy
author: Kang'ethe Njenga
